startMessage:
Hello, this is *TeN Weather*.
A bot that provides the following real-time informations for your location:

① Weather Information
Such as temperatures (current, maximum, minimum and feels like), wind speed, air humidity and weather alerts.

② Astronomical Information [Coming Soon]
Such as sunrise and sunset times, moonrise and moonset times and the current phase of the moon.

Use /help to learn how to use commands.
help_message:
*TeN Weather* is a bot for *real-time* weather and astronomical information for your location.

You can use it inline without adding it to channels or groups. Just type the bot's username and your city's name.

*Source Code:* [GitHub](https://github.com/leviobrabo/climatologiabot)
chooseLanguage: Select the language you want to use:
langChangedMessage: Your language has been set to 🇬🇧 Engish.
chooseLangMessage: Select the language you want to use:
inline_psq: 🔎 Research what the weather is like in your locality.
title_init: Enter the name of your city.
description_init: (If you can't find it, type it in the format: City, UK or US.)
msg_text_init:
You can use me inline, which means you don't have to add me to groups. Just enter my username and the name of your location.

For example: <code>@TeNClima_bot Tokyo</code >
city_weather_forecast_message:
*{{formattedCityName}}, {{countryCode}}*
🌡️ *{{temperature}}°C* • {{emoji}} _{{weatherDescription}}_
*⬆️ {{tempmax}}°C* • *⬇️ {{tempmin}}°C*

🔥 *Feels Like:* {{feelsLike}}°C
💨 *Wind Speed:* {{windSpeed}} km/h
💧 *Relative Humidity:* {{humidity}}%
{{alertMessage}}

🕑 Checked on {{FormatedDate}} at {{horarioFormatado}}.
no_alert_message: 🟢 There is no weather alert for your city.
error_message: (Unable to retrieve weather information for this city. Please try again later.)
description_error: (Unable to obtain weather information for this city.)
pv_message_lang: ⚙️ Click the button below to change the language in a private chat.
description_short: I'm an inline bot that provides real-time weather information.
